name: Gunmetal (itch) (SlapChickenGames)
description:
Gunmetal is a free-to-play multiplayer FPS aimed at recreating the high intensity and fun environment of tournament/skirmish type shooters. It is currently in an extremely early testing stage that showcases mechanics of the weapons and movement around a close quarters map. This stage is also to allow followers to report bugs and suggestions. Keep in mind that this is being solo-developed so long term changes can take time to implement. Thanks for following and have fun playing!

IMPORTANT - The download above is for the launcher which will prompt you for an update. Then the main game will download. This is in place so that dynamically updating the game is possible. Thank you!

Youtube Channel - https://youtube.com/SlapChickenGames

FAQ’S

  1. My launcher won’t respond. If the launcher is not responding after install, you need to run it as admin as you probably installed it into program files x86.
  2. My installer won’t work. Probably windows defender preventing it from opening.
  3. My graphics changes won’t apply in game.  Some graphics options are broken due to the upgraded rendering for the project...this will be fixed later on.
